description_text:
Hey, about a week ago I got a message from you. The shipping is gonna be
delayed because What’s going on in my country everything is good Now, I
like to get update What’s up with the shipping thank you the order was on
this mail

 Best regards.

null

conversations.body_text: Hi ٰ,  Could you please provide your order number? The second batch of orders is scheduled to start shipping this Saturday. I’ll check whether your order has already been dispatched.

#SSN1594

Ty

null


On Thu, 26 Jun 2025 at 12:32 service@simsonn.com
Hi ٰ,    We asked our logistics provider and they said flights have not resumed yet. We will ask more logisticians to ship your order as soon as possible.
